name: Koutetsu no Kishi 3: Gekitotsu Europe Sensen
overview: Koutetsu no Kishi 3: Gekitotsu Europe Sensen ("Steel Knight 3: Clash on the European Front") is a strategy game from Dual and Asmik. It follows Koutetsu no Kishi and Koutetsu no Kishi 2, both of which were also released on the Super Famicom. As with its predecessors, the player takes control of a German World War 2 panzer division as they conquer Europe, though they can also take control of the Allies. The player can take part in a pre-generated scenario or create their own with the game's construction set. It's one of a handful of Super Famicom games to use the SNES Mouse peripheral.
